comments.body: why not change this method to accept `UniqueDeviceName` and avoid the conversions?

Because the value happens to be the same as `UniqueDeviceName` for these tests, but may be different. `attachedVolume.VolumeSpec.Name()` could be any arbitrary string--it's actual type is a string not `UniqueDeviceName`
I think these test cases are detailed enough that it would be a great benefit to get a descriptive comment on each (that isn't a trivial one)
